song.englishname: Not So You Will Love Me

english.segment1: I wanna live in the moment. Like there's nothing that I lack. I wanna give like there's nothing to lose. And no reason to look back
english.segment2: CHORUS. Not so You will love me. Not so You will love me. Not so You will love me. But because You do
english.segment3: There's no way to impress You. There's no grace I can earn. Help me to see that my life is a gift. I can give in return
english.segment5: Because You do. I don't have to prove a thing. Because You do. I am free. Where there's suffering I'll bring comfort. Where there's wandering I will guide. Where there's judgment I'll show mercy. Where there is darkness I'll be light
